description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 21/02779/FUL (External alterations at ground, first and second floor including new fenestration, doors, balconies and recladding of the facade). Amendment to include new external doors at the North and West elevations.

ART4 New Malden District Centre Inset Area
